desc: Girl Next Door Fashion is locally owned and operated in Queenstown NZ. We stock some of NZ and Australians most popular fashion labels such as Stella + Gemma, Elm, Charlo, Minx, Stitch Ministry, Home Lee, Augustine, Betty Basics, Wish, Sass, LBT, Minx Shoes and more

layout.text: Take an extra 20% off Use the code SALE at checkout. Ends Sunday
